scripts.test:watch: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=testing tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text-summary jasmine --config=.jasmine.unit.json"
scripts.test:watch:report: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=testing tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "nyc jasmine --config=.jasmine.unit.json"
scripts.test:watch:debug: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=testing tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "npx -n '--inspect-brk=0.0.0.0:9222' jasmine --config=.jasmine.unit.json"
scripts.test:once: npm run clean && npm run compile && NODE_ENV=testing nyc jasmine --config=.jasmine.unit.json
scripts.integration-test:watch: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=testing tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text-summary jasmine --config=.jasmine.integration.json"
scripts.integration-test:watch:report: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=testing tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "nyc jasmine --config=.jasmine.integration.json"
scripts.integration-test:watch:debug: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=testing tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "npx -n '--inspect-brk=0.0.0.0:9222' jasmine --config=.jasmine.integration.json"
scripts.integration-test:once: npm run clean && npm run compile && NODE_ENV=testing nyc jasmine --config=.jasmine.integration.json
scripts.dev:watch: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development LOG_LEVEL=debug tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "node -r source-map-support/register ./build/src/index.js"
scripts.dev:watch:debug: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development LOG_LEVEL=debug tsc-watch --preserveWatchOutput -w --noEmitOnError false --onSuccess "node -r source-map-support/register --inspect-brk=0.0.0.0:9222 ./build/src/index.js"
scripts.compile:production: npm run clean && echo Compiling... && tsc -p tsconfig.prod.json
scripts.shell: npm run shell:build && docker-compose  -f docker-compose.shell.yml run --rm -u 1000 --service-ports app bash || true && echo Stopping environment... && npm run shell:stop
